author: On February
title: Eugenie Bouchard Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Caroline Wozniacki Serena Williams - Yahoo7
text:
Share Eugenie Bouchard Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Caroline Wozniacki Serena Williams - Yahoo7 Serana Williams, Eugenie Bouchard and Caroline Wozniacki are gracing the pages of the 2017 edition of Sports Illustrated's Swimsuit Issue. Close Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated UP NEXT VIDEO Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated. Source: Sports Illustrated Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated 
The tennis superstars all posted sneak peeks of their photo shoots on social media ahead of the magazing hitting newsstands. 
Sports Illustrated also shared a few images on their Instagram and Twitter accounts, as well as a full gallery on their website . Williams, Bouchard and Wozniacki. Image: Twitter/Sports Illustrated 
In a shirt teaser video, which you can watch in the player above, Bouchard opened up about appearing in the iconic magazine for the first time. 
"I do have to say I practiced a little bit on my bed, asking myself 'if I was on the sand right now how would I pose and what would I do.' Bouchard. Image: Instagram/Sports Illustrated 
"I had to get into the mentality of how to be sexy on the beach." 
It's the second time for Wozniacki, who made her SI debut in 2016, while Serena famously made the cover in 2015. Close Caroline Wozniacki in bodypaint for Sports Illustrated UP NEXT VIDEO Caroline Wozniacki in bodypaint for Sports Illustrated. Source: SI Caroline Wozniacki in bodypaint for Sports Illustrated 
Joining the tennis stars are US Olympic gymnasts Simone Biles and Aly Raisman, who were part of the hugely successful American team at Rio 2016, becoming household names in the States. 
"Aly and Simone represent all that is beautiful and strong and inspiring in women today," said MJ Day, the Swimsuit issue's editor, in a statement. Close Aly Raisman, Simone Biles in Sports Illustrated UP NEXT VIDEO Aly Raisman, Simone Biles in Sports Illustrated. Source: Sports Illustrated Aly Raisman, Simone Biles in Sports Illustrated 
"I love seeing them shine in an entirely different way in the Swimsuit issue and being able to share these gorgeous and powerful images with the world. These women, their beauty, and what they can achieve know no limits." 
Fellow athletes Ronda Rousey (UFC) and Lindsay Vonn (skiing) also appeared in the 2016 edition. Close BTS With Ronda Rousey For Sports Illustrated UP NEXT
